I think hermitcraft this season does way too many command things. I like the cosmetic custom model data things, but then it gets weird when commands and specific mods are used that aren't just utility/visual. Like with Doc's thing, that's just not vanilla, which I think kinda takes away from the idea of the server
9:17 what a sweet little interaction with Doc. It's the small things that make this server a Family.
